deploy.startCommand: echo '[Startup] Building...' && npm run build && echo '[Startup] Build complete, checking dist...' && ls -la dist/ && echo '[Startup] Checking for index.js...' && (test -f dist/index.js && echo '[Startup] ✓ index.js found' || echo '[Startup] ✗ index.js NOT FOUND') && echo '[Startup] Listing all .js files in dist:' && find dist -name '*.js' -type f | head -10 && echo '[Startup] Starting server...' && node dist/index.js
